data.title: Lapham’s Quarterly
data.meta_description: The table of contents for our Summer 2019 issue.
data.text:
The Summer 2019 issue of Lapham’s Quarterly, Happiness, is now on newsstands. With original essays by Maddy Crowell, Henry Freedland, Jay Griffiths, and David Wootton; Voices in Time contributions by Hannah Arendt, Margaret Atwood, Saint Augustine, Matsuo Basho, Dante Alighieri, Samuel Johnson, Alice Munro, Mary Oliver, Dorothy Parker, Vita Sackville-West, Benedict de Spinoza, Mark Twain, and others; and art by Hieronymus Bosch, Yamamoto Masao, and others.

Subscribe now and receive Happiness as your first issue.

INTRODUCTORY

Cover | Mesoamerican “smiling figure,” Mexico, seventh or eighth century

Program Notes | Among the Contributors

Map | Happy Places

Preamble | David Wootton, The Impossible Dream
